name: Panda Run In The Jungle Free - Can You Hop To The Finish?
name_original: Panda Run In The Jungle Free - Can You Hop To The Finish?
description:
Panda Bear Baby Run is the latest in the series of animal running games from Wanaka Mobile.

Like all other games, Panda Bear Baby Run is a fun and addicitve running game for the entire family to enjoy.

Take Pand Bear on an adventure run and help him cover a huge distance. Jump over obstacles and collect lives as you run, jump and dodge.

There are different obstacles that makes your run even more interesting. So WATCH OUT!

The Panda's life chances are limited so cover the maximum distance as quickly as possible and set a new record on the global gamecenter leaderboard.

This is a universal game that works on iPhone, iPad, and iPod Touch

FEATURES:
- Beautiful retina graphics! Looks AMAZING on iPhone 4 and 4s.
- Use intuitive touch gestures to to guide baby elephant
- Amazing animations and sound
